itemDescription: Jewish spy working for the British in World War I

wikipedia_page.main: Sarah Aaronsohn (Hebrew: שרה אהרנסון‎; 5 January 1890 – 9 October 1917) was a member of Nili, a ring of Jewish spies working for the British in World War I, and a sister of notable agronomist Aaron Aaronsohn. She is often referred to as the "heroine of Nili."
